entry.def: Someone or something that is alluring is very attractive.

example.ex: Why are the contents of the next person's shopping trolley always more alluring than one's own?
example.tran: 为什么旁边人购物车里的东西看起来总是比自己车里的更诱人呢？

example.ex: ...the most alluring city in South-East Asia.
example.tran: 东南亚地区最迷人的城市

means.word_mean: 1. highly attractive and able to arouse hope or desire;

sentences.sentence: "difficult to say no to an enticing advertisement"
